long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Currency Conversion made easy with search all in your new tab.

What is the CurConv Extension?
With just a few clicks, you can easily convert any currency directly from your browser while have the ability to search using Microsoft Bing search engine.

Installation
1. By clicking on the Add to Chrome button.
2. By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the CurConv extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ new tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. Search results will be powered by Bing, You may remove or disable this extension anytime.
3. Review our Privacy Policy: https://curconv.com/privacy.html
4. Review our Terms of Service: https://curconv.com/terms.html

Features
* Uninstall anytime easily from the new tab.
* Search from your new tab

Contact 
Contact us at privacy@curconv.com or https://curconv.com
